titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Veterans' Administration should develop and construct a full-service outpatient clinic in the area of Youngstown, Ohio.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 10/21/1988--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Veterans Administration should develop and construct a full-service outpatient clinic in the area of Youngstown, Ohio.
